name: stent
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a long thin object put inside a tube in the body, for example a blood vessel, so that its walls stay firm or so that body fluids can flow easily through it

a small piece of mesh that keeps any tube-like body structure open so body fluids can flow freely through it
